title: Five of the Top AI Stocks to Buy Immediately
body: The artificial intelligence story shows no signs of cooling. Instead, according to McKinsey the AI market could swell to $17 trillion to $25 trillion by...
complete_article_text: The artificial intelligence story shows no signs of cooling. Instead, according to McKinsey the AI market could swell to $17 trillion to $25 trillion by 2030. In addition, AI related spending will make up about 8% to 10% of IT budgets in 2024, according to Wedbush. “This demonstrates a remarkable acceleration in AI spending after it comprised less than 1% of IT budgets in 2023,” added Seeking Alpha. All of which could positively impact VERSES AI (CBOE: VERS) (OTCQB: VRSSF), Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA), Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), C3 AI (NYSE:AI) and Amazon.com (NASDAQ: AMZN) to name a few of the top ones.

full_text: Meta Platforms has launched its most advanced AI model to date, Llama 3, which is distinguished by its extensive multilingual abilities and high-perf.
title: Meta Platforms reveals Llama AI Model 3 with enhanced capabilities
body: Meta Platforms has launched its most advanced AI model to date, Llama 3, which is distinguished by its extensive multilingual abilities and high-perf.
complete_article_text: (MENAFN) Meta Platforms has launched its most advanced AI model to date, Llama 3, which is distinguished by its extensive multilingual abilities and high-performance metrics. Unlike many AI models that are only accessible through paid subscriptions, Llama 3 offers a largely free option and delivers competitive performance on par with, or even exceeding, that of paid models from other companies like OpenAI. According to Meta's announcements and research publications, this latest iteration of the Llama model can fluently communicate in eight different languages, generate high-quality computer code, and tackle more complex mathematical problems compared to its predecessors.

complete_article_text: Apple unveils ground-breaking approach to AI training utilizing unique data sources. In a departure from traditional methods, the tech giant has steered clear of mainstream content platforms for its latest AI development. Instead of relying on YouTube subtitles, Apple has taken a bold new direction for its “Apple Brainchild” project. This innovative AI, set to revolutionize upcoming operating systems like “iOS 18” and “macOS Sequoia,” boasts advanced capabilities in language processing, image comprehension, and seamless multitasking across various applications.

complete_article_text: SES’s wholly-owned subsidiary SES Space Defense has been awarded the pilot effort to provide the U.S. Army with Satellite Communications (SATCOM) as a Managed Service (SaaMS) under a $3.6 million ceiling blanket purchase agreement (BPA). This initiative will streamline commercially leased SATCOM network services to be flexible and tailored to changing mission needs. The contract was awarded to Global Enterprise Solutions (GES), acquired by SES in 2022, and is now part of its wholly-owned subsidiary.

full_text: The “forever fans” category created by our team is perfect for marketers because these are people who are engaged, not passive consumers.
title: Fan Data Deconstructed
body: The “forever fans” category created by our team is perfect for marketers because these are people who are engaged, not passive consumers.
complete_article_text: Everyone seems to agree that fan data is the gold mine behind the current boom in the sports business and the significant increases in the valuations of sports franchises. Yet, no one is talking about what these stats actually mean. Who are the fans, what motivates them, how loyal are they, and what are their consumption habits? I will aim to solve that by presenting proprietary fan data from the insights team at my company.

full_text: Adobe has just made a host of streamlined changes to its Illustrator and Photoshop Creative Cloud platforms. The company announced today how it was rolling...
title: Adobe Updates Its Illustrator And Photoshop Creative Cloud Apps With New Features
body: Adobe has just made a host of streamlined changes to its Illustrator and Photoshop Creative Cloud platforms. The company announced today how it was rolling...
complete_article_text: Adobe has just made a host of streamlined changes to its Illustrator and Photoshop Creative Cloud platforms.The company announced today how it was rolling out a series of changes that would facilitate greater productivity on the users’ end. Moreover, a lot of the new features would make use of generative AI as well as machine learning. This would assist in saving so many people’s time.For starters, Photoshop has its own latest Selection Brush Tool. This would assist certain area selections by simply placing the brush across them. Moreover, you no longer have to go and use the Quick Mask initiative to do so. Meanwhile, users can also attain featured edges with the latest settings for adjusting opaqueness and hardness to get the best finishing.Adobe’s Adjustment Brush Tool was in beta for a while now but today, it’s also available. This enables painting to be done across any adjustments for better saturation, brightness, and more. There’s a wide range of fine-tuning options to avail. At the same time. Adobe confirmed how the much anticipated generate image text to image feature is up for grabs after being in beta. So now, users can produce so many ideas through a simple text prompt or reference picture.Meanwhile, other features worth mentioning include an enhanced Contextual Task Bar. similarly, Adobe boasts about greater support for lists and even more options for rolling out enhanced details and Generative Fills.All in all, Adobe Illustrator has a new Generative Shape Fill option for filling up shapes having details and color. In this way, users combine hue and style together to produce several editable graphic options which can also be scaled.Text prompts would be used for filling up vector graphics for options such as Generative Shape Fill. Meanwhile, some features also include greater style designs like geometrics, 3D, and pixel art.The latest Text to Pattern offering on Illustrator makes it so much easier to produce, edit, and even scale various vector patterns. Any vector graphic produced through this means saying hello to crispier images with fancy UI controls that give enhanced options for editing.Another cool rollout would be the Mockup feature where a designer could see creations across objects such as product packaging and clothing. This simply adjusts the art piece so it fits easier on the object’s edges.There’s another Dimension tool for sizing with greater precision and also a wide selection of capabilities featuring faster pan speeds. Clearly, Adobe is on a roll this time around as creators are given so much to play with.All the latest set of offerings are going to be up for grabs on the latest variant of the Illustrator app and also for Photoshop across desktops. You can find more details on the website in case you’re interested to learn more about what more can be availed.Read next:
processed_summary: Adobe has just made a host of streamlined changes to its Illustrator and Photoshop Creative Cloud platforms.The company announced today how it was rolling out a series of changes that would facilitate greater productivity on the users’ end.

title: Elon Musk Gets His Way: He Already Has The Largest AI Farm In The World
body: We've been in a bit of an AI frenzy for the past few months among the world's biggest companies. NVIDIA got started before anyone else and that has helped.
complete_article_text: We’ve been in a bit of an AI frenzy for the past few months among the world’s biggest companies. NVIDIA got started before anyone else and that has helped them become the most valuable company on the planet, but now everyone else is trying to get on the bandwagon in time to claim their share of the pie, and someone like billionaire Elon Musk couldn’t be less… so what he’s done is throw huge wads of cash at NVIDIA to set up the biggest farm in the world.
